The End!(Happy)
(K) Press K!
Learn more about the nurse.
Their name is Kit and they seem to be the most wonderful person you have ever met. 
You love spending time with them and you love to make them laugh. 
After you recover you decide to start an apprenticeship at the Oak Valley Medical Centre C. 
This way you get to stay near nurse Kit. 
You two finally get together 2 years later and marry soon after. 
After several more years Kit takes over the Medical Center as the new head of healers.
You both work towards healing as many people as you can daily. 
You live a long happy life with Kit.
